[30;1m117 | [0m[35m            # pylint: disable=import-outside-toplevel[0m

[30;1m18 | [0m[35mdef cli(env, identifier, details):[0m
[30;1m19 | [0m[35m    """Invoice details[0m
[30;1m20 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m21 | [0m[35m    Will display the top level invoice items for a given invoice. The cost displayed is the sum of t[0m
[30;1m22 | [0m[35m    cost along with all its child items.[0m

[30;1m19 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m20 | [0m[35m        slcli globalip unassign 123456[0m
